Fedi-To

Fedi-To is attempting to redefine Web-based Protocol Handlers, by both making them a Web-first system and bringing them to mobile. Fedi-To helps handle web+ protocols while providing an improved user experience.

It is our hope that by launching this service, we can show how Web Protocol Handlers can significantly improve the web.

The current pilot includes only a handful of handlers; wide availability is still being worked on. However, support for /.well-known should be coming soon.

This project is made by Soni L., you can support them on Patreon.

Terms of Service Privacy Policy

This project is made with love by a queer trans person.
